---
title: ""
page-layout: full
toc: false
format:
  html:
    include-in-header:
      text: |
        <style>
        /* ===== VARIABLES ===== */
        .projects-container {
          --primary: #0d6efd;
          --secondary: #00bcd4;
          --accent: #6f42c1;
          --success: #20c997;
          --warning: #fd7e14;
          --eco: #2d6a4f;
          --bg-card: #ffffff;
          --bg-light: #f8fafc;
          --text-dark: #1e293b;
          --text-muted: #64748b;
          --border: #e2e8f0;
          --radius: 16px;
          --shadow-hover: 0 12px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
          --transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
        }

        .projects-container {
          max-width: 1100px;
          margin: 0 auto;
          padding: 2rem 1rem;
        }

        /* ===== HEADER ===== */
        .projects-header {
          text-align: center;
          margin-bottom: 3rem;
        }

        .projects-header h1 {
          font-size: 2.5rem;
          margin: 0 0 0.75rem 0;
          background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary), var(--secondary));
          -webkit-background-clip: text;
          background-clip: text;
          color: transparent;
        }

        .projects-header p {
          color: var(--text-muted);
          font-size: 1.1rem;
          max-width: 600px;
          margin: 0 auto;
        }

        /* ===== FILTRES ===== */
        .filter-tabs {
          display: flex;
          justify-content: center;
          gap: 0.5rem;
          margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
          flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .filter-btn {
          padding: 0.6rem 1.25rem;
          border: 2px solid var(--border);
          border-radius: 25px;
          background: white;
          color: var(--text-muted);
          font-size: 0.85rem;
          font-weight: 500;
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: var(--transition);
        }

        .filter-btn:hover { border-color: var(--primary); color: var(--primary); }
        .filter-btn.active { background: var(--primary); border-color: var(--primary); color: white; }

        /* ===== GRILLE PROJETS ===== */
        .projects-grid {
          display: grid;
          grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(320px, 1fr));
          gap: 1.5rem;
        }

        /* ===== CARTE PROJET ===== */
        .project-card {
          background: var(--bg-card);
          border: 1px solid var(--border);
          border-radius: var(--radius);
          overflow: hidden;
          transition: var(--transition);
          cursor: pointer;
          text-decoration: none;
          color: inherit;
          display: block;
        }

        .project-card:hover {
          transform: translateY(-6px);
          box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
          border-color: transparent;
        }

        .project-image {
          height: 160px;
          background-size: cover;
          background-position: center;
          position: relative;
        }

        .project-badge {
          position: absolute;
          top: 0.75rem;
          left: 0.75rem;
          padding: 0.3rem 0.7rem;
          border-radius: 15px;
          font-size: 0.7rem;
          font-weight: 600;
          text-transform: uppercase;
        }

        .badge-ml { background: var(--accent); color: white; }
        .badge-viz { background: var(--secondary); color: white; }
        .badge-data { background: var(--success); color: white; }
        .badge-eco { background: var(--eco); color: white; }
        .badge-python { background: #38bdf8; color: white; }

        .project-status {
          position: absolute;
          top: 0.75rem;
          right: 0.75rem;
          padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem;
          border-radius: 10px;
          font-size: 0.65rem;
          font-weight: 600;
        }

        .status-complete { background: #d1fae5; color: #065f46; }
        .status-progress { background: #fef3c7; color: #92400e; }

        .project-content {
          padding: 1.25rem;
        }

        .project-title {
          font-size: 1.1rem;
          font-weight: 700;
          color: var(--text-dark);
          margin: 0 0 0.5rem 0;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          gap: 0.5rem;
        }

        .project-desc {
          color: var(--text-muted);
          font-size: 0.85rem;
          line-height: 1.5;
          margin: 0 0 1rem 0;
        }

        .project-tech {
          display: flex;
          flex-wrap: wrap;
          gap: 0.35rem;
        }

        .tech-tag {
          background: var(--bg-light);
          color: var(--text-muted);
          padding: 0.2rem 0.5rem;
          border-radius: 6px;
          font-size: 0.7rem;
          font-weight: 500;
        }

        .view-more {
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          gap: 0.5rem;
          margin-top: 1rem;
          padding-top: 1rem;
          border-top: 1px solid var(--border);
          color: var(--primary);
          font-size: 0.85rem;
          font-weight: 600;
        }

        .view-more .arrow {
          transition: transform 0.3s;
        }

        .project-card:hover .view-more .arrow {
          transform: translateX(5px);
        }

        /* ===== CTA ===== */
        .cta-section {
          margin-top: 4rem;
          text-align: center;
          padding: 3rem 2rem;
          background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary), var(--secondary));
          border-radius: var(--radius);
          color: white;
        }

        .cta-section h2 { font-size: 1.8rem; margin: 0 0 0.75rem 0; }
        .cta-section p { opacity: 0.9; margin: 0 0 1.5rem 0; }

        .cta-buttons { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 1rem; flex-wrap: wrap; }

        .cta-btn {
          padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
          border-radius: 25px;
          text-decoration: none;
          font-weight: 600;
          transition: var(--transition);
        }

        .cta-btn-white { background: white; color: var(--primary); }
        .cta-btn-white:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); }

        /* Animation */
        .project-card {
          opacity: 0;
          transform: translateY(20px);
          animation: fadeInUp 0.5s ease forwards;
        }
        .project-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.05s; }
        .project-card:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
        .project-card:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.15s; }
        .project-card:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
        .project-card:nth-child(5) { animation-delay: 0.25s; }
        .project-card:nth-child(6) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
        .project-card:nth-child(7) { animation-delay: 0.35s; }
        .project-card:nth-child(8) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
        .project-card:nth-child(9) { animation-delay: 0.45s; }

        @keyframes fadeInUp {
          to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
        }

        .project-card.hidden { display: none; }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
          .projects-header h1 { font-size: 1.8rem; }
          .projects-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
          .filter-btn { padding: 0.5rem 0.9rem; font-size: 0.75rem; }
        }
        </style>

<script>
(function() {
  const filterBtns = document.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn');
  const projects = document.querySelectorAll('.project-card');

  filterBtns.forEach(btn => {
    btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
      filterBtns.forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));
      this.classList.add('active');
      const filter = this.dataset.filter;

      projects.forEach(project => {
        if (filter === 'all' || project.dataset.category === filter) {
          project.classList.remove('hidden');
        } else {
          project.classList.add('hidden');
        }
      });
    });
  });
})();
</script>
